April 21, 2022 - Bosch Thermotechnology is committed to reinventing energy efficiency by offering smart products that fit together and work together as integrated systems which enhance the quality of your life in an ultra efficient and environmentally friendly manner.
Invented for life: we want our products to spark enthusiasm, improve quality of life, and help conserve natural resources.

The goal: to combine living comfort and green technologies. To achieve this goal, the Bosch Home Comfort Group bundles the expertise of international and regional brands under one roof. In 2023, the company was renamed from "Bosch Thermotechnology" to "Bosch Home Comfort Group".
